title: TRADED: T206 Demmitt (St. Louis) SGC AUTH
author: Kotton King

posts.post_title: TRADED: T206 Demmitt (St. Louis) SGC AUTH
posts.post_content:
TRADED

Email: [url]crazylocomerk@yahoo.com[/url]

T206 Ray Demmitt (St. Louis variation) SGC AUTH.
It's a good looking card.  Unfortunately trimmed on the top and bottom, but the result is a very aesthetically pleasing card.  Much better then most of the low grades that sell out there.

In a trade, I'm looking for some of the upper tier T206 HOFers (graded).  I would consider any grade as long as they are visually appealing.

HOFers I'm most interested in:
-Johnson (portrait)
-Mathewson (portrait)
-Cobb (red), Cobb (green), 
-Cobb (Bat off Shoulder) w/Polar Bear back
-Young (portrait), Young (glove showing)
-M. Brown (portrait), M. Brown (Cubs on shirt)
-Lajoie (portrait), 
-Chance (red portrait)
-Joss (portrait)
-Chesbro 
-Crawford (throwing)
-Wheat

Also would like:
-T206 Elberfeld (Washington, portrait)
-T206 Shag Shaughnessy

T206 backs I still need with a HOFer front (graded):
-Hindu (Red) - Factory 649 - District 1 - State NY
-Cycle - Series 460 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
-American Beauty (no Frame) - Series 350 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
-American Beauty (with Frame) - Series 350- Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
-Cycle - Series 350 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
-Sweet Caporal - Series 350-460 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
-Sweet Caporal - Series 150 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
-Sweet Caporal - Series 350-460 - Factory 30 - District 2 - State NY
-Piedmont - Series 350-460 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA 

Cards other then T206's I'd be interested in (graded):
-E95 Cicotte
-E90-1 Chase
-E92 Crofts Candy (blue or red backed)
-T216's

TRADED!!!!!!




My card:
[IMG]http://i282.photobucket.com/albums/kk264/crazylocomerk3/For%20Sale%20or%20Trade/1909-11T206DemmittRayStLouisVariati.jpg[/IMG]
Thanks for all the inquires.  The card has been traded.
